sn51.15:1: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—​ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ vihārati ghositārāme. Atha kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodi. Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho uṇṇābho brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṁ Ānandaṁ etadavoca: "kimatthiyaṁ nu kho, bho Ānanda, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṁ vussatī"ti?
sn51.15:2: "Atthi pana, bho Ānanda, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā"ti?
sn51.15:3: "Katamo pana, bho Ānanda, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa chandassa pahānāyā"ti?
sn51.15:4: "Evaṁ sante, bho Ānanda, santakaṁ hoti no asantakaṁ. Chandeneva chandaṁ pajahissatīti – netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati".
sn51.15:5: "Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, yo so bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto, tassa yo pubbe chando ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yo tajjo chando so paṭippassaddho; yaṁ pubbe vīriyaṁ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṁ tajjaṁ vīriyaṁ taṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ; yaṁ pubbe cittaṁ ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yaṁ tajjaṁ cittaṁ taṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ; yā pubbe vīmaṁsā ahosi arahattappattiyā, arahattappatte yā tajjā vīmaṁsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
sn51.15:6: "Addhā, bho Ānanda, evaṁ sante, santakaṁ hoti no asantakaṁ. Abhikkantaṁ, bho Ānanda, abhikkantaṁ, bho Ānanda. Seyyathāpi, bho Ānanda, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṁ bhotā ānandena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito. Esāhaṁ, bho Ānanda, taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca. Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ ānando dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan"ti.
